block.p: The curtsy and the garden party chat took only a moment, but they ended two decades of enforced silence between Queen Elizabeth II and Camilla Parker Bowles, mistress to Prince Charles. By agreeing to attend a formal luncheon at her 51-year-old son's country estate with full knowledge of just which 52-year-old divorced woman would be by his side, the monarch signaled her acceptance of the relationship that the heir to the throne had long sought.
